alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:33PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lafayette, northeastern Jefferson, northeastern Taylor, Madison, southwestern Lowndes, southeastern Thomas and southern Brooks Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 433 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles west of Lake Park to 8 miles southwest of Dowling Park. Movement was west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Madison, Perry, Quitman, Lake Park, Boston, Greenville, Lee, Dills, Grooverville, Ebb, Lamont, Everett, Hamburg, Buckville, Pinetta, Eridu, Lovett, Nankin, Empress and Clyattville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison
